phrases: Time is etched, and then chaos descends!
Time is etched... and then chaos descends?
About Lisanna's grave in the cathedral...
What should we do about it?
Are you going to destroy it?
I do not know about that...
The church said we could do what we want with it.
We are the ones who made it.
Do you have to bring that up now?
Well, I suppose it would be nice to leave as a memento.
Just change the inscription, or something.
I just thought about this at the church, but is not it about time?
Oh yeah, paying respect to the archbishop or something.
It is an important festival for the church, right?
This archbishop person only comes out in front of people once every few years.
A huge number of pilgrims gather just to get a glimpse of him, even from far off countries.
You do not know anything, do you, Natsu?
Yesterday, at dawn, the Akaza district church erupted in a fiery explosion.
There have been more than 30 cases now.
And yet we still have no clue who is behind it.
We have analyzed a number of the destroyed churches...
Many other countries are watching us carefully at this time.
We must discover who is responsible and arrest them in all haste.
The good name of the Enforcement Corps will be tarnished at this rate.
And it will be we, the Magic Council, that will take the blame.
It is a string of church bombings!
We met him during that Nirvana business...
Has not changed a bit in seven years...
He said he was tired from working in the fields, so he is taking a nap.
Strange that serial bombings like this just pop up...
We have been out of the loop for seven years, so...
Thanks to that, my prediction powers do not seem to be working right.
I can only see vague, inconclusive things.
Lucy-nee, you have got a visitor!
Do not go making her cry off the bat.
It is been quite a long time, so I suppose it is no surprise you do not remember.
It is been too long, Lucy-neesan!
Lucy's old man had an illegitimate daughter!
The Lobster family and the Heartfilia family are distantly related.
Oh, so you are Lucy's relative.
Guess that is what they mean when they say a world of difference...
I do not really get it, but you are Lucy's daughter, then?
How did you draw that conclusion?!
So wait, why are you addressing me like I am older?
You clearly look older than I am.
Natsu, are you following what they are saying?
So it is like, that Time Ark thing?
We had our time stopped for seven years on Tenroujima,
but for everyone else time moved forward, right?
When you consider Lucy's actual age, it is not strange
for Michelle to call her neesan as if she is an older relative.
Natsu seems to be refusing to think about it.
I finally am able to meet you!
And by the way, what is that case?
I have come to give this... to you...
I have been searching for you forever in order to give it to you!
And you call yourself a Man?!
Looks like we got proof she is related to Lucy...
It is a memento of your father, Jude Heartfilia.
I helped Uncle Jude for a little while with his work.
And I was there when he passed away...
He asked me to pass this along to you.
He was always worried about you after you went missing.
But he said that he knew you were still alive out there, somewhere, and asked me to find you.
He passed away peacefully, as if going to sleep.
Ever since that day, I have been searching for you.
And now, I have finally met you!
With this, I can fulfill Uncle Jude's dying wish!
All I was told was to give this case to you, so...
Why do not you see what is inside?
She searched like crazy for you, remember.
Why do not you let her see this thing she took all this trouble to deliver?
I think it is got a spell on it.
That must be what I smelled earlier.
Is it something that Uncle Jude valued?
I do not recall ever seeing it before.
Your guild seems like a fun place.
My father really is forgetful sometimes.
I cannot believe he forgot to tell you about Fairy Tail!
Well, I found you were in the guild right away.
So, you are a Celestial Wizard, Nee-sama?
Sure, a lot of them lack any delicacy...
But they are all good folks, and if anything happens they band together and fight!
And they value their friends above all else.
Uncle Jude was really proud of you.
Thank you for coming to see me, Michelle.
It is thanks to my father that I have been able to live here.
Wait over there, I will make some tea.
If it is not any trouble...
I lost my mother early, seven years flew by before I realized it...
Who would have thought I would have a relative?
Well, everyone in the guild is like my family, kind of...
I am sorry, I did not mean to...
What happens to Iris after this?!
That is what the tears are about?
And hey, do not read that without permission!
I could not find any information on it.
You have got a dream for your future.
I do not have any dreams.
So, what are you going to do now?
Why do not you stay here, then?
But, are you sure I will not be in the way?
Then I will look for a job here in Magnolia and we can share the rent!
But hey, if you want work, why not work at Fairy Tail?
Michelle Lobster came to deliver a memento to me from my father.
Like an older, younger sister that suddenly showed up.
She can do everything, and really makes my life easier.
She does not speak much about herself, but she seems somehow helpless.
Although there is a lot of things about her you would mistake at first glance.
Something just makes you want to protect her.
I have got to up my game.
Mother, I wonder if Father got her to come to me so I would not be lonely?
She is taken a real liking to me.
Time to round up some bandits.
I would like to come see this job!
But, I would like to see what it is like being a wizard...
Especially the part about never knowing what will happen with this team.
But, what will the Master say?
Sure, I will let you go.
And you get the most out of things that other people say you are not ready for.
Remember how you went off on an S Class quest right after you joined, Lucy?
Well, why do not you come along?
Everyone will be together, and if anything happens, I will protect you!
This will be the Bandit Hunt in Honor of Lucy Getting a Little Sister!
According to the request flier, the victims now all suffer from nightmares.
Sounds like they had a real number done on'them.
The soldiers from the kingdom scoured the mountains,
but they all came back crying like babies, it says.
Yeah, I knew this sounded dangerous...
Oh yes, is anyone else hungry?
It is amazing that you are more reliable than the kingdom's soldiers!
When you put it that way, I suppose.
I borrowed it from the client!
First, in order to catch the bandits off guard, Lucy and I will ride in the front,
to provide the illusion of two women traveling.
Natsu, Gray, and Michelle who is here to observe, will hide themselves in the back.
After they surround us, Lucy will use her sex appeal to distract the ones in front,
and in the meantime, Natsu and Gray will clean up the guys in the back.
For the rest, we will attack on both sides and...
I cannot go riding in no carriage!
You have an objection to my plan?
I am not budging from this position!
If you would like, I can handle the reins.
That means you will be a decoy, you know.
It will be easier if we concentrate our attack power in the back, right?
And I want to be helpful, too!
In the end, this is the compromise...
This is all thanks to Erza and her annoying plans, anyway.
Do not leave my side, okay?
And what is this Erza plan, again?
My skin is just as shiny as yours!
Enough with Miss Ugly, let us get the cargo.
This was not in the plan!
Maybe they have got cosmetic supplies!
Sorry, but we are the cargo!
How dare you make a mockery of my plan I stayed up all night thinking of!
I will arrest you all at once!
You are not what we expected, either.
How dare you defile we pure maidens with your filthy deceit!
How dare you look down on us just because you were born a woman!
I guess this is what people were having nightmares of.
It is time for your punishment!
Dazzling Blaze of the Fire Dragon!
So, will you come with us without resistance?
Your team really is strong, Nee-san!
Yeah, I will try and work hard too next time.
Guilds are a lot of fun!
We make a ton of racket, but there is never a dull day.
I got an acquaintance of mine to look into things.
Laki's gone to get the report.
Sorry about making you handle this kind of stuff.
At any rate, this is what they found.
The Lobster Family really was a wealthy plantation family concentrated in the Zentopia Church Parish.
Guess I was worried for nothing.
Well, there was the time with Mest... I mean, Dranbalt.
But it is still a relief.
The Lobster family was a wealthy plantation family?
That is because a number of years ago there was a terrible incident.
I do not understand this at all.
Burnt to the ground, and this time corroded?
If I consider the distance between each parish, and the varied magic traces,
I can come to no other conclusion than there are multiple culprits.
He seems to have been out when the tragedy happened.
But I heard there was a body discovered here...
But I was sure this church only had the one priest...
He is very insistent that there was no one there.
Um, Lucy-neesan... I have been thinking.
As long as you can pay money, guilds will do what you want, right?
I was thinking, why not request the guild to investigate that memento?
That is so smart of you, Michelle!
Never heard of a wizard asking a wizard for help!
Hand over a request flier upstairs.
Putting in a request for the guild?
I want to do something to help you understand what Uncle Jude wanted to say to you.
Then, I will take it on!
So, it is a fateful union?
They have both lost their families...
You went and researched her identity...
Well, I am the Master, after all.
This is how I got us through these seven years.
There is something else that is worrying me...
In that case, get Levy-chan to...
She is off far away with Shadow Gear on a job.
It is trying to tell us something...
Cannot you read those characters, Gramps?
You would be better off not getting involved with this.
I am going to solve this riddle, no matter what!
Challenging Laxus to a fight, again?
Hey, it is not just me!
But you challenge Erza to a fight indiscriminately, too!
That is what it means to be a man always striving for the top!
That is what it means to be a man who does not know his place.
Lucy's still fighting with that short stick.
So after becoming an invisible figure, she wants to be a stick figure?
